remarks: Double complement under universal class.  The hypothesis is one way of expressing the idea that membership in ` A ` is decidable.  Exercise 4.10(s) of [Mendelson] p. 231, but with an additional hypothesis.  For a version without a hypothesis, but which only states that ` A ` is a subset of ` _V \ ( _V \ A ) ` , see ~ ddifss .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 21-Jul-2018.)
statement:
ddifnel.1 $e |- ( -. x e. ( _V \ A ) -> x e. A ) $.
ddifnel $p |- ( _V \ ( _V \ A ) ) = A $.
$d A x $.
